help: help (displays help message),  normal play (starts a game),  turn play (starts a turn based game),  scores (shows lifetime points)
normal rules (displays normal game rules),  turn rules (displays turn game rules),  reveal rules (display reveal game rules)
guess <letter>,  answer <phrase>,  join (join turn base game), leave (exit yourself from current game)
normal_rules: First person to guess the phrase is the winner!
turn_rules: Every correct letter guess gives you a point for how many times letter was in phrase.
Person with most points at the end of the game is the winner!
reveal_rules: Letters are slowly revealed to the players.
First person to guess the phrase is the winner!
start: Has started a battle of wits.
Challenges the co-ops to defeat him/her.
Wants everyone to let him/her win this game.
Is secretly hoping that he/she will win this game.
in_game: You dimwit! Can't you see we are playing.
What is your problem? We are in a game.
I shall forgive you this time.
win: Thinks he/she is better than all of you!
Is the fairest of them all.
right: Beat everyone else to the punch.
Is faster at typing than you.
wrong: How does it feel to be wrong?
Has probably been playing with his/her eyes closed.
Is crying in a corner right now.
Apparently, thinks by this is the random typing game.
not_letter: Wow really, not even an option.
Can you please not finger fumble?
Is not as smart as he/she appears.
Hopes no one saw he/she didn't pick a letter.
used: Why would you guess a letter that has already been used?
Please use your eyes next time
Is forfeiting his/her chance to earn points
incorrect: Wishes he/she could get one right.
join: Thinks he/she has a chance of winning.
Likes to escape from what he/she should be doing.
join_now: Knights come to the Round Table.
Be a part of the game of the Century!
If you join now you can join for free!
leave: Has gone back to pretending to work.
Has forfeited his/her right to the crown!
